name: Car Trailer Transporter Duty
description:
Car Trailer Transporter Duty is ultimate car driving games for all transportation games fans to utilize city driving school car driving skills to perform multilevel truck transport duty. Be a USA truck limo car transporter and enjoy driving in urban city roads in this multi truck car transport parking master simulatorYou as trailer truck car transporter will carefully drive multi truck to successfully complete car transportation mission.
FEATURES:
• Challenge Car transportation mission in city!
• Fulfill Trailer Truck Car Transport duty timely!
• Excellent sound effects and engine sounds!
• Multiple gameplay Scenarios with Transportation missions!
